Text: The Coalition of the Radical Left (Greek: Συνασπισμός Ριζοσπαστικής Αριστεράς , "Synaspismós Rizospastikís Aristerás " ), mostly known by the syllabic abbreviation Syriza (a Greek adverb meaning "from the roots" or "radically", and sometimes styled "SY.RIZ.A."
